description: top image  men wearing hats and long coats and carrying small paddle-like objects walking in a circle around a draped, closed coffin; group of men at right; bottom image  group of men around an open grave; six men with shovels around edge of grave; ship masts visible in background above structures; matted and framed
title: The Acafoth, or the Seven Turns Round the Coffins, and The Assistants Throws Mould Upon the Corps
